PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12972018-10-22,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectInterim Order Amending the Ozone-depleting Substances and Halocarbon Alternatives Regulations
PrecisOrder Approving the INTERIM ORDER Amending the OZONE-DEPLETING SUBSTANCE AND HALOCARBON ALTERNATIVES REGULATIONS in order to deal with a significant danger to the environment by correcting this value which is used to determine the quantities that can enter Canada under the Hydrofluorocarbon phase-down process starting on January 1, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
